pages.text: This Sigil can hold up to 5 other $(item)Sigils$() at a time, providing you with their passive effects and allowing you to activate them on a whim.$(br)Press [$(k:bloodmagic.keybind.open_holding)] while holding the Sigil to open its inventory.$() $(br)Press [$(k:bloodmagic.keybind.cycle_holding_pos)] to cycle forward,$() or [$(k:bloodmagic.keybind.cycle_holding_neg)] to cycle backwards.$() holding [$(k:sneak)] and using your mousewheel also works.
